DOC.detailed_description: The purpose propose pilot study evaluate rehabilitative cognitive-behavioral group psychotherapy intervention telehealth intervention veteran undergoing interferon treatment hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) . The specific objective propose pilot study : 1 ) develop study method material ; 2 ) evaluate study feasibility ; 3 ) ass efficacy cognitive-behavioral group therapy approach telehealth approach compare care usual randomize design . Participants 45 patient ( 15 participant condition ) VA Boston Healthcare System undergoing interferon treatment HCV . Assessment occur pre-treatment , post-treatment , 3-month follow-up . Assessments measure key area , include adherence , quality life , psychological distress . Analyses examine study feasibility effect treatment condition . It hypothesize CBT condition telehealth condition result significantly improve outcome , include enhanced adherence , quality life , psychological status .
